name: react-chrome-extension-example
content_security_policy: frame-src 'self' https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/ http://www.bbc.com/news http://edition.cnn.com/ https://tribune.com.pk/ http://www.dawn.com/; default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
